missing_parts.description: The 'validate_move' method in the ChessGame class has a placeholder comment and a 'pass' statement, indicating the logic for move validation is not implemented.
The 'make_move' method in the ChessGame class contains a 'pass' statement under the 'if' condition, indicating the code to update the board and change turns is not implemented.
The comment in the ChessBoard class suggests additional methods for board manipulation and representation can be added, which may indicate incomplete implementation.
The comment in the ChessGame class suggests additional methods for game management can be added, which may indicate incomplete implementation.
